shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 6ra-106va) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah and hymns (fols. 6ra-10rb) I-2) Introductory exhortation (fols. 10rb-11vb) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki... "I worship Thee..." (fols. 11vb-12vb) I-4) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 103 miracles (fols. 12va-106va) I-5) ʾAkkonu bǝʾǝsi ... "Does not the man ..." (distributed among the miracles of Mary, fols. 25vb-46vb)
Colophon.

copyists.copyist: In the colophon, qes gäbäz Zä-Maryam from "the place of life" Ḉǝh (the monastery of Ḉǝh Śǝllase in Tämben) is mentioned as the scribe.

donors.donor: According to the colophon, the Ms. was donated by lǝğ Bärhe (of) Bäʿatti, whose baptismal name was Gäbrä Ḥǝywät. The latter name has been inserted into supplication formulas (fols. 15vb, 18rb, 21vb etc.); in addition, other names are mentioned like Wälättä Maryam (fols. 10va, 12va, 18ra etc.), Wälättä Ṣadǝqan (e.g., fols. 16ra, 59vb, 73rb), Gäbrä Mikaʾel (e.g., fols. 19rb, 55vb, 77vb), Wälättä Kidan (e.g., fols. 19rb, 49rb, 52ra), Wäldä Śǝllase (fols. 23ra, 25va, 27ra etc.).

dcomments.dcomment: According to the colophon, the Ms. was written during the time of the Italian occupation (zämänä mängǝśtomu Romawǝyan), on 18 Miyazya 1929 year of mercy (= 26 April 1937 A.D.).

txstates.txstate: Fols. 6r-13v show traces of extensive use, leaves are covered with dirt and wax. Quire I (one bifolio with miniatures) might have been added later as it is not incorporated into the sewing but loosely attached to the endbands. Holes or tears carefully amended on fols. 48, 52, 59.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather (for the most part hidden under the secondary textile cover); textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover is visible only on the turn-ins of the backboard and on the edges (at least 2 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle).

bnothers.bnother: An additional thread is lead through fols. 6r-27v, between the tiedowns and the 1st sewing station.

txfolios.txfolio: The signature written on the ruler (visible in the pictures) is wrong.

squires.squire: A(3; sl.: 3, stub before 1/fols. 1r-3v) – I(2/fols. 4r-5v) – II(8/fols. 6r-13v) – III(8/fols. 14r-21v) – ፫IV(8/fols. 22r-29v) – ፬V(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 30r-37v) – [፭]VI(8/fols. 38r-45v) – ፮VII(8/fols. 46r-53v) – ፯VIII(8/fols. 54r-61v) – ፰IX(8/fols. 62r-69v) – ፱X(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 70r-77v) – ፲XI(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 6; 7, stub after 1/fols. 78r-85v) – ፲፩XII(8/fols. 86r-93v) – ፲፪XIII(8/fols. 94r-102v) – XIV(6/fols. 103r-107v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Quire IX, all data for fol. 63r.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: Mediocre, irregular. Hand b: mediocre but careful.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a, Zä-Maryam: quires II-VIII, X-XIV. Hand b: quire IX (fols. 62ra-69vb l.18).

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; names of other characters like Mikaʾel (fols. 10ra, 57ra, 75vb, 76rb), Gäbrǝʾel (fols. 24ra, 23rb, 57ra, 75vb, 76rb, 106rb), Raguʾel (fol. 25ra), Giyorgis (fol. 46rb), ʾIyaqem and Ḥanna (fols. 47rb-49ra); names of the donor and other individuals; the word täfäśśǝḥi "rejoice" (fol. 12ra-rb); elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4; first one or two lines of Texts I-2, I-3 and of their sections; two initial lines of sections of Text I-4; first one or two words of each strophe of Text I-5.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 83ra) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ (e.g., fols. 54ra, 56vb, 87va, 92rb, 104ra, 105rb) ለዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 99rb, 100rb) ለዓ፡ አ፡ ን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 18ra, 48rb) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 81vb, 86ra, 93vb) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ ን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 55ra) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ (e.g., fol. 90ra) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አ፡ ን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 61rb, 94vb) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አ(ሜን)፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 27va, 30vb, 38vb, 43rb) ለዓለ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 53rb) ለዓለ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 25vb, 83va) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አ(ሜን)፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 28rb, 39vb) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 36rb, 98rb, 100rb) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ (e.g., fol. 97ra) ለዓለመ፡ ዓ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ (e.g., fol. 102ra) ለዓለመ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 54va) ለዓለመ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ ን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 62ra, 106vb) ለዓለመ፡ ዓለ፡ አ፡ ን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 72rb, 80va)

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus kähali ... "O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus the Almighty ..." (fol. 9rb-va) (cp. ChRep no. 373) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam dǝngǝl ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady, Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ..." (fols. 9va-10rb).
Most of the miracles of Mary (Text I-4) are numbered. The numbers 7 and 8 were not used; the numbers 27-29 (fols. 43va-48rb) and 37 (fol. 54ra-va) were used twice. The last miracle in quire VIII is numbered as 51 (hand a). Quire IX, written in hand b, includes eight miracles, from which four are numbered as 39-42. Consequently, hand b continues the numbering on quire X starting with number 60 (fol. 70vb).
The first miracle is followed by a short hymn: Sobä ṣäḥafä Däqsǝyos täʾamriha ʾǝludä ... "When Däqsǝyos wrote the collection of her miracles ..." (fol. 10rb)
Text I-5 comprises 20 strophes which are strophes 2-21 according to GrohHymn pp. 336-47.

colophon.tran: Fol. 106va: This book was written during the reign of the Romans in 1929 year of mercy, in the time of the Evangelist Matthew, in the month of Miyazya, on the 18th day. For ever and ever. Amen. The one who commissioned the writing of the miracles is lǝğ Bärhe (of) Bäˁatti, his baptismal name is Gäbrä Ḥǝywät who commissioned the writing with his money. The one who stole it or erased (its text) shall be excommunicated by the authority Peter and Paul. And its scribe is qes gäbäz Zä-Maryam from the place of life Ḉǝh.

extras.extra: - Spaces for names of individuals to be rubricated are sometimes left unfilled (e.g., fol. 23ra, 26ra, 29vb, 35ra, 37ra, 40ra). - All spaces for names of individuals to be rubricated are left unfilled in quire IX (written in hand b). - A few omitted words are inserted interlineally: fols. 29vb, 45vb, 82vb. - A longer text passage has been written over erasure (?) on fol. 84ra (one column).

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Quire marks, sometimes decorated, are written in the centre of the upper margin: fols. 30r: ፬, 46r: ፮, 54: ፯, 62r: ፰, 70r: ፱, 78r: ፲, 86r: ፲፩, 94r: ፲፪.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the names of the feasts and other occasions written in the upper margin, probably in different hands: ዘቍስቋም: fol. 12va ዘጌና: fol. 19rb አመ፡ ፰ለሰኔ፡ በዘዓንቅዓ: fol. 21ra ዘልደት: fol. 21vb ዘደቅስዮስ: fol. 23ra ዘልደታ: fol. 46vb ዘበዓታ: fol. 49rb ዘስቅለት: fol. 62ra ዘእሁድ: fol. 68rb ዘመላእክት: fol. 75va ዘኪዳነ፡ ምሕረት: fol. 77ra ዘደብረ፡ ምጥማቅ: fol. 80vb ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት: fol. 83ra ዘዕቆና: fol. 87ra ዘትንሣኤ: fol. 87va በጼዴንያ: fol. 94ra ዘህዳር፡ ጽዮን: fol. 94vb ዘበዓታ: fol. 97rb ዘትስብዕት: fol. 98rb ዘሆሣዕና: fol. 102ra ዘሕንጸታ: fol.102vb ዘቅዳሴ፡ ቤታ: fol. 103va ዘአመ፡ ፯ለነሐሴ፡ fol. 104ra ዘፍልሰታ: fol. 104va.

miniature.info: Fol. 4v: St. George slaying the dragon.
miniature.details: Painted on ruled leaf. The leaf is of smaller size.
Illegible legend at the bottom. Painted on ruled leaf which is of smaller size. The miniature is protected by a textile curtain.
